Turkey can keep the differences that make it strong.
If there were intolerance towards the different in these lands, so many different ethnic backgrounds, languages ​​and beliefs would not coexist.
There are imperial powers that want Turkey to be powerless. They are trying to destroy Turkey inside and outside.
If we are not in solidarity, it will be a shame for the future of our country.

We do not present the presidential system as an essential condition in constitutional work.
Whatever the issue is in Turkey, we should try to solve it within the legitimacy circle.
